text: The Invisible Man is a 1933 American pre-Code science fiction horror movie directed by James Whale. It is based on H. G. Wells' 1897 science fiction novel The Invisible Man and produced by Universal Pictures. It stars Claude Rains and Gloria Stuart. In 2008, The Invisible Man was selected for the United States National Film Registry by the Library of Congress as being "culturally, historically, or aesthetically significant.""2008 Entries to National Film Registry." Library of Congress, December 30, 2008; accessed January 14, 2016. A reboot was released in 2020. ==References== Category:1933 movies Category:1930s science fiction movies Category:1930s horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Mad scientist movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Invisible Man (1933 movie)
